about_the_game:
Embark on an enchanting journey into the heart of a magical garden in "Garden Warfare: Crab Invasion." As the caretaker of this vibrant ecosystem, your mission is to nurture and protect the majestic tree at its center, ensuring its growth and prosperity amidst the whims of nature.

In this captivating plant-themed game, players must harness the power of sunlight and water to fuel the tree's growth. Strategically collect sunlight by recruiting diligent Pixies, agile guardians of the garden, who tirelessly retrieve water from nearby sources. Meanwhile, the Sun Buds, charming plant companions, scurry across the ground, gathering precious sunlight to feed the growing tree.

But beware, for lurking within the shadows are cunning enemies, relentless Crabs bent on sabotage and plunder. These nefarious creatures will stop at nothing to steal sunlight and deplete your water reserves, threatening the very survival of your garden sanctuary.

As the tree flourishes and expands, so too does the challenge. With each new growth spurt, players must fortify their defenses, fend off enemy attacks, and outmaneuver the Crab invaders to protect their precious resources. Will you rise to the occasion and lead your garden to victory, or succumb to the relentless onslaught of the Crab Invasion?

Embark on an epic quest filled with strategy, adventure, and fantastical creatures in "Garden Warfare: Crab Invasion." Let your green thumb guide you as you cultivate a flourishing garden and defend it against the forces of darkness. Are you ready to unleash the power of nature and reclaim your garden from the claws of the Crab invaders?

name: Garden Warfare: Crab Invasion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i3-530 or AMD® FX-6350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® iCore™ i5-3570K or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required to play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i5-3570K or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 560 Ti (1GB VRAM) or AMD® Radeon™ R7 370 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required to play

short_description: In 'Garden Warfare: Crab Invasion,' nurture your garden's central tree by collecting sunlight and water. Command Pixies to fetch water and Sun Buds to gather sunlight while defending against cunning Crabs. Can you outsmart the invaders and lead your garden to victory?
